document.masterDocTitle: Solomon’s Gold Mine: Description or redescription of 24 species of Caridina (Crustacea: Decapoda: Atyidae) freshwater shrimps from the Solomon Islands, including 11 new species

de Mazancourt et al. (2018c)
recently designated a lectotype for
C. brevidactyla Roux, 1919
and redescribed it in detail. This species is now known from Indonesia (Aru Island, Halmahera), Papua New Guinea ( New Britain ), Solomon Islands ( Choiseul , Kolombangara, Vella Lavella, Isabel ), Vanuatu (Efate, Epi, Malekula and Santo), New Caledonia and Fiji . This species is encountered in the lower part of rivers, sometimes in brackish conditions near the estuary.
